title: Tassel, 1962-51-27, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Linen tassel, braided and knotted. Single loop attached to tiny braided stem which in turn is attached to round ball. Letter completely covered with numerous tiny knottings.
